Sentencas: A novel low-carbon chemical solution method is established and successfully scaled up to prepare (La0.75Sr0.25)(0.95)MnO3 +/-delta(LSM)
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method

Sentencas: nano-powders, in which acetate and acrylic acid have been used as raw materials.
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method

Sentencas: Distinguish from the traditional chemical solution methods, nitrate and amino compound are non-used in this method and without causing any fire hazard or explosion condition which are usually found in most of the solution synthesis reactions.
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method

Sentencas: The organic compound emission is reduced to a quarter of that in the citric acid-nitrate method.
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method

Sentencas: This optimization is attributed to the low application amount and high effect of acrylic acid by means of the co-operation of ethylenic linkage and carboxyl group.
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method

Sentencas: As-prepared powders are high purity, single phase, slight aggregation with grain size less than 100 nm.
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method

Sentencas: The conductivity of the sintered LSM sample is measured about 220 S cm(-1) in air at 700-1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method

Sentencas: The polarization resistance of LSM-YSZ cathode is less than 0.1 Omega cm(2) at 800 degrees C. Anode supported Cells with configuration of Ni + YSZ/YSZ/LSM +
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method

Sentencas: YSZ exhibit the power density of 0.54 W cm(-2) at 800 degrees C and 0.7 V. These results indicate that the novel acetate-acrylic method is very suitable for mass synthesis of high performance LSM powders.
Titulo: Mass synthesis of high performance (La0.75Sr0.25)0.95MnO3±δ nano-powder prepared via a low-carbon chemical solution method
